import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Comment from './Comment' const ProjectSummary = ({ project }) => { return(
{project.authorFirstName[0]}{project.authorSecondName[0]} {project.authorFirstName} {project.authorSecondName} more_vert
thumb_up comment send

{project.title}

{project.createdAt .toDate() .toLocaleDateString('indian', { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric" })}

) } export default ProjectSummary
